title: The Great Candy Volcano
description: Stop the Candy Volcano from exploding and covering Sweet-Top Valley in sticky goo!

preview.tagline: Can you save Sweet-Top Valley before everything gets covered in candy goo?

ageRating.reason: Silly candy adventure with teamwork and mild magical action

prologue.worldIntro: Welcome to Sweet-Top Valley, a magical land where rivers flow with chocolate and mountains are made of rock candy. Everything here is delicious — and a little bit sticky!

characterIntros.introText: Spark Wizard loves sparkly things and exciting adventures! Spark can cast a Sparkle Shield to protect friends and shoot Marshmallow Blasts.
Frost Wizard is cool and calm, even in tricky situations! Frost can freeze things with icy breath and build bridges out of snow.
Bloom Wizard loves nature and making new friends! Bloom can grow magical rainbow vines and talk to animals.

prologue.missionBrief: Oh no! The Candy Volcano is about to explode! If it blows, the whole valley will be covered in sticky candy goo. The three wizards must work together to stop it!

characters.name: Spark Wizard
characters.description: A brave wizard who casts Sparkle Shield and Marshmallow Blast

characters.name: Frost Wizard
characters.description: A cool wizard who can freeze things and make snow bridges

characters.name: Bloom Wizard
characters.description: A nature wizard who grows rainbow vines and talks to animals

scenes.narrationText: Jellybeans rain from the sky! The Candy Volcano glows pink in the distance. BOOM! Lightning strikes the mountain!

successOutcome.text: Magic reveals the Candy Core Crystal is cracking inside the volcano!

failOutcome.text: Bonk! A jellybean hits Spark's head! A gummy bear waddles over and points the way.

successOutcome.text: A shimmering shield surrounds everyone! Jellybeans bounce off harmlessly.

failOutcome.text: The shield turns into cotton candy! Delicious, but not very protective. Oh well!

successOutcome.text: Icy magic cools the river into a perfect chocolate road!

failOutcome.text: Oops! The spell makes chocolate ice cream everywhere! Messy but tasty.

successOutcome.text: A sparkling snow bridge forms over the bubbling chocolate. Safe!

failOutcome.text: The bridge melts into a slushy slide! Everyone slides across giggling.

successOutcome.text: A giant lollipop flower shoots up! From the top, the volcano entrance is visible!

failOutcome.text: The flower is wobbly, but friendly gummy bears help hold it steady!

successOutcome.text: Rainbow vines catch all the falling jellybeans like a net!

failOutcome.text: The vines become a jellybean hammock! Everyone takes a quick bouncy rest.

outcome.resultText: The wizards push through the storm and reach the volcano!

scenes.narrationText: A wiggly bridge made of giant gummy worms stretches over hot fudge! It jiggles with every step.

successOutcome.text: The gummy worms become firm but still bouncy. Perfect for crossing!

failOutcome.text: One worm snaps and falls — but it becomes a stepping stone in the fudge!

successOutcome.text: The fudge thickens into a safe, soft landing zone. No danger now!

failOutcome.text: The fudge turns into fudge popsicles sticking up everywhere! Weird chocolate forest.

successOutcome.text: Strong sparkly vines for everyone to hold! Nobody can fall now.

failOutcome.text: The vines are TOO sticky — everyone's hands get glued together! Teamwork!

successOutcome.text: The gummy worms giggle and agree to hold very still. How polite!

failOutcome.text: The worms get excited and wiggle MORE! But they wiggle everyone safely across.

successOutcome.text: The gummy worms float up and arrange into perfect stepping stones!

failOutcome.text: The worms tangle into a bouncy trampoline! Boing boing across!

successOutcome.text: Giant marshmallows appear below! The crossing feels like a game now.

failOutcome.text: Marshmallows shoot UP instead of down! Everyone gets fluffy marshmallow hats.

outcome.resultText: Across the bridge! A golden lollipop floats into your pocket.

scenes.narrationText: Two tall Peppermint Knights guard the volcano gate! 'HALT! Solve our riddle to enter!'

successOutcome.text: Candy flowers bloom at their feet. The knights bow and open the gates!

failOutcome.text: The flowers tickle their toes! They giggle so hard they drop their spears.

successOutcome.text: The cutest wizard dance! The knights are charmed and bow as they open the gates.

failOutcome.text: Bloom trips mid-dance! The knights feel bad and open the gates anyway.

successOutcome.text: 'Correct!' The knights smile and the gates swing open with sparkles!

failOutcome.text: Spark squeaks 'Chocolate!' in a funny voice. The knights giggle and let everyone in!

successOutcome.text: Sparklers shoot everywhere! The knights clap and let everyone through.

failOutcome.text: The trick turns their spears into pool noodles! They laugh and wave everyone in.

successOutcome.text: 'Ahh, thank you!' The knights sigh with relief and open the gate.

failOutcome.text: Brain freeze! They make funny faces but still open the gate.

successOutcome.text: Perfect snow cones! The knights do a happy dance and open the gates.

failOutcome.text: HUGE snow cones bonk their helmets! They laugh and share the giant treats.

outcome.resultText: The gates swing open. Inside, the volcano glows with rainbow light!

scenes.narrationText: A sad Marzipan Dragon sits by the cracked Candy Core Crystal. 'I didn't mean to break it!'

successOutcome.text: Magic wraps the crystal like a candy ribbon! The crack seals perfectly.

failOutcome.text: The spell makes candy sprinkles! The dragon catches them to patch the crack.

successOutcome.text: The dragon feels better and helps with the repair! Teamwork!

failOutcome.text: Spark makes a silly face! The dragon's happy tears help seal the crack.

successOutcome.text: The bubbles turn into gentle caramel clouds. Safe!

failOutcome.text: Oops — caramel apples! Everyone gets a tasty snack.

successOutcome.text: The dragon smiles at the refreshing hug. 'You're so nice and cool!'

failOutcome.text: The hug is SO cold the dragon shivers, then laughs and warms everyone up!

successOutcome.text: Rainbow vines wrap the crystal in a perfect sparkling net!

failOutcome.text: The vines are loose, but the dragon sneezes a sugar cloud that tightens them!

successOutcome.text: Everyone hugs the crystal together and it glows warmly. It worked!

failOutcome.text: The crystal is confused! The dragon translates: 'Hug harder!' And it works!

outcome.resultText: The Candy Core Crystal is fixed! The dragon smiles and the volcano rumbles happily.

scenes.narrationText: The volcano rumbles one last time — and instead of goo, it bursts with CONFETTI! Rainbow sprinkles, chocolate fountains, and cotton candy clouds fill the sky! Every candy creature in Sweet-Top Valley rushes out to celebrate. The Marzipan Dragon soars overhead, breathing sparkly fireworks. 'You did it!' the dragon roars happily. 'You saved us all!'

outcome.resultText: The dragon floats down and places glowing gumdrop halos on each wizard's head. 'Heroes of Sweet-Top Valley!' All the candy creatures cheer and dance as the biggest celebration in candy history begins!

endings.title: Legendary Candy Heroes!
endings.narrationText: The Marzipan Dragon declares today 'Wizard Heroes Day!' Fireworks made of cotton candy light the sky. The whole valley throws the biggest party ever seen — and you're the guests of honor! Whenever sweetness turns to chaos again, the three legendary wizards will be ready!

endings.title: Great Job, Wizards!
endings.narrationText: The Marzipan Dragon gives you big candy hugs! The volcano is safe, and Sweet-Top Valley can relax again. The candy creatures wave goodbye as you head home, heroes of the day! They'll never forget what you did.

endings.title: You Saved the Day!
endings.narrationText: The Candy Volcano is calm again! It was a bumpy adventure with lots of silly moments, but you did it together. The Marzipan Dragon waves goodbye with a smile. Sweet-Top Valley is safe — and that's what matters!
